other_tests.findings: Suggestive of severe mitral regurgitation, but images were technically suboptimal.

Intact mitral leaflets, marked disruption and fistulization of the anterior mitral annulus with a 9 x 7 mm irregularly shaped opening; systolic left ventricular-to-left atrial flow through the fistula, characteristic Doppler signal of mitral regurgitation.
Normal, without evidence of valvular pathology.
